company that is providing the service or product.

WE
hope that by getting to know a little about our team, you mayÂ decide that

MEET THE TEAM
â
Jeff Warrington
Owner/ Operator/ Management Team
SERVICE DATE:
June 1, 1988
HOME STATE:
Florida
As a teenager and young adult, Jeff spent countless hours working in Orange Acres and Cedar Cove in the areas of community maintenance, groundskeeping, resident manager of Cedar Cove, sales, resident service, obtaining bids for community projects, resident relations,and doing whatever needed to be done. This allowed Jeff to learn how to manage the business from the ground up.
Today Jeff serves as President and Owner/Operator.
Jason Warrington
Owner/ Operator/ Management Team
SERVICE DATE:
May 1, 1992
HOME STATE:
Florida
Jason spent countless hours working in both Orange Acres and Cedar Cove as a teenager and young adult in the areas of community maintenance, groundskeeping, resident manager of Cedar Cove, sales, resident service, obtaining bids for community projects, resident relations, and doing whatever needed to be done.This allowed Jason to learn how to manage the business from the ground up. Today Jason serves as Vice-President and Owner/Operator.
Greg Hostetler
Director of New Home Placement & Specialized Maintenance/ Management Team
SERVICE DATE:
September 1, 1987
HOME STATE:
Ohio
Greg is our Director of New Home Placement and Specialized Maintenance. His father, Earl, was Maintenance Supervisor at Orange Acres and both of his sons have worked in the Maintenance Department. He handles all aspects of New Home Placement from lot lay-out, lot prep, home set-up and construction, permitting, and warranty needs. Greg can fix just about anything. He also oversees community maintenance projects, supervises part of the maintenance team, and is in charge of all vehicles and equipment upkeep.
Tronn Goehring
Director of Property Management
SERVICE DATE:
September 12, 2016
HOME STATE:
Minnesota
Tronn handles all aspects of sales in both Orange Acres and Cedar Cove for New and Pre-Owned home sales. This includes: listing, selling, contract, and closing. He also handles New Home orders for both models and custom homes. Tronn deals with rule implementation and resident relations for both communities. He also coordinates Work Orders and monthly checklists with the Maintenance Team.
Phoebe Godbold
Executive Assistant
SERVICE DATE:
August 8, 2016
HOME STATE:
Florida
Phoebe works in the Office serving as Jeff & Jasonâs Executive Assistant. She also has other various Executive and Administrative roles in the business such as payroll, bookkeeping responsibilities, and handles all digital resources such as community websites and social media.
Amy Warrington
Sales/ Office Team
SERVICE DATE:
June 2, 2010
HOME STATE:
Florida
Amy handles the rentals in our communities and assists with Sales along with helping out in various other tasks and projects in the Main Office and in our Communities.Amy also coordinates and assists Warrington Enterprises events.
Mark Bulger
Maintenance Team
SERVICE DATE:
November 27, 2006
HOME STATE:
Florida
Mark works on the Maintenance Team in our communities, primarily in grounds keeping such as tree trimming, grass cutting, landscaping, etc. Mark also assists with different aspects of community maintenance and resident services. He also helps with pull-out and new home set-up.
Andrew Warrington
Maintenance Team
SERVICE DATE:
May 1, 2019
HOME STATE:
Florida
Andrew works on the Maintenance Team in our communities, primarily in grounds keeping such as tree trimming, grass cutting, landscaping, etc. Andrew also assists with different aspects of community maintenance and resident services. He also helps with pull-out and new home set-up.
Joe Golinski
Maintenance Team
SERVICE DATE:
October 2, 2017
HOME STATE:
Massachusetts
Joe works on the Maintenance Team in our communities. Joe also assists with different aspects of community maintenance, resident services, and various community projects and tasks. He is also assigned the important task of upkeep at the pool, Community Centre, and court area of Orange Acres so that they are always neat and well maintained.
Luke Warrington
Maintenance Team
SERVICE DATE:
June 7, 2021
HOME STATE:
Florida
Luke works on the Maintenance Team in our communities, primarily in grounds keeping such as tree trimming, grass cutting, landscaping, etc. Luke also assists with different aspects of community maintenance and resident services. He also helps with pull-out and new home set-up.

See What our residents have to say
âOrange Acres is a home that offers the kind of lifestyle you are looking for. It can be as busy and involved or as relaxed and peaceful as you wish.Â  There is always help and information from management, activities if you want and new friends around each corner. Come be as happy as you choose!â
- Jane B.
"I have lived in Orange Acres for 20 years, and it is the best mobile home park in Florida. The office personnel and maintenance crew are the finest I ever met."
- Charlie P.
"More than a dozen years ago we were looking for a house in a warm climate to shelter us from the winter weather in the North. What we found was a home in a community; one that reminded us of those towns where we grew up. A caring, enveloping, vibrant array of people with similar backgrounds, people who cared for one another, looked out for their welfare and bonded in like enjoyments."
- Ed & Judy M.
"There are numerous reasons why we love living in Orange Acres, such as location, layout of homesites, facilities and activities. But the most obvious reason is the people; not just the residents, but also the management personnel. They genuinely have the residents best interest at heart in making their business the success that it is. With the 3rd and now 4th generation of the Warrington family involved in every day business, it makes all of the residents feel very secure in the future of Orange Acres and the success of our park for years to come."
- Bob & Cyndee S.
